title: Spanish Conversation Meetup: Beginner-Friendly Practice
description: A relaxed evening to practice Spanish with supportive mentors. Short prompts, small groups, and buddy intros available for newcomers.

faqs.q: Do I need to be fluent?
faqs.a: No. All levels welcome, especially beginners.

faqs.q: Will someone help me get started?
faqs.a: Yes. Ask for a buddy mentor on arrival.
Friendly, low-pressure practice with short, fun prompts.
